title: IDSIPSSnort
extract: Snort is a free open source network intrusion detection system (IDS) and intrusion prevention system (IPS) created in 1998 by Martin Roesch, former founder and CTO of Sourcefire.
extract_html: Snort is a free open source network intrusion detection system (IDS) and intrusion prevention system (IPS) created in 1998 by Martin Roesch, former founder and CTO of Sourcefire.
